data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Carlini, Alfredo A., Brandoni, Diego, Dal Molin, Carlos N. (2013): A new genus and species of Planopinae (Xenarthra: Tardigrada) from the Miocene of Santa Cruz Province, Argentina. Zootaxa 3694 (6): 565-578, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3694.6.4
